body:
Hi, the go dashboard is here: https://build.golang.org

I don't think Travis CI integration with Github would be very useful for the go project, since development does not happen via github pull requests (so contributors usually don't fork the go repository on gihthub).

p.s. The github tracker is for issues, please use the [golang-dev mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/golang-dev) for discussion about development of the Go Project.
